title: AT 25 TIX FOR NON PES
content: Pretty much the title. WHEN will the ticketing for non PES students start?

comments.body: Idt they are selling it to non pes this time
Are you from the AT team?
They are not selling to non PES this time, ask AT team if u want. I had asked one from AT team and they had told me that AT is only for PES ppl this time
That's weird, do you know why? Usually AT is open to everyone. I myself have bought tickets after graduating.
I heard that The contract with artists says pes exclusive
That doesn't add up because this is a chance to make more money by including outsiders. Plus, outsider tickets have always coated more afaik
Maybe to reduce the crowd and increase the quality of the fest for our university students itself
I think its artists preference at the end of day. Not sure exactly, but the reason cud be to reduce crowd maybe?
i already bought tickets for in-house tickets,the ppl who were selling tickets allowed me to, non pes are still allowed for in-house events on 4th april right?

non-pes for in-house events, yes

non-pes for AT ProNite, not this time, artist contract said only PES students allowed

From an AT Org

There is a lot of drama with AT this time
Mainly in regards to mohith chauhan.
Ooooh I smell tea. Spill ðŸ‘€
